Supply Only Corten Steel Garden Edging Mornington.

For the landscapers, builders, and serious DIY homeowners who want professional-grade materials without the retail markup.

Why Choose Our Steel?

Not all "rusty metal" is genuine Corten. Many cheap imports are simply mild steel that creates a flakey, destructive rust that eventually eats through the metal. Garden Edge supplies only genuine weathering steel (often referred to by the trademark Cor-Ten).

Our steel develops a stable, protective oxide layer that resists corrosion, ensuring your garden borders last for decades, not just seasons.

Available Sizes & Specifications

We stock a range of gauges and heights to suit every application, from decorative flower beds to structural retaining:

  • Heights: 100mm, 150mm, 200mm, 300mm.
  • Gauges (Thickness): 1.6mm (Flexible), 2.0mm (Standard), 3.0mm (Heavy Duty).
  • Lengths: Standard 2400mm lengths for easy transport and handling.

The Complete DIY System

We don't just sell the metal strips. We provide the complete installation system used by pros:

  • Connector Plates: Pre-drilled joiners for seamless connections between lengths.
  • Heavy Duty Pegs: Twisted or ribbed steel pegs that lock the edging into heavy clay or sandy loam.
  • Corner Pieces: Prefabricated 90-degree internal and external corners for sharp, geometric designs.

Delivery to Mornington Peninsula

We deliver weekly to all Mornington Peninsula suburbs including Portsea, Sorrento, Rye, Rosebud, Dromana, Mt Martha, and Mornington. Our truck is equipped to handle long lengths without bending or damage.

"The 1.6mm edging was flexible enough to create amazing curves around my gum trees, but strong enough to hold back the mulch. Delivered right to my driveway in Balnarring." - Sarah J., Homeowner

Pricing & Ordering

Because steel prices fluctuate, we update our trade price list weekly. Contact us below for a current quote on your specific linear meterage requirements.
